      • getMasterContextAttributes

        public java.util.Map getMasterContextAttributes(java.lang.String layoutName)
                                         throws ViewConfigException
        Assemble context attributes for master layout. This method puts correct filenames int tiles context to pass them to master layout
        Parameters:
        servletContext - context of the caller servlet
        siteName - name of directory, under which this site is deployed
        layoutName - name of the layout in site-config.xml file
        Returns:
        context attributes for master layout
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if error occurs
        ViewConfigException

      • getPagePath

        public java.lang.String getPagePath(java.lang.String pageName,
                                    boolean appendExtension)
                             throws ViewConfigException
        Returns path of the JSP page from site's 'layouts' directory.
        Parameters:
        pageName - name of the page (header, footer, etc)
        appendExtension - true, if .jsp extension should be appended to pageName and false, if not
        Returns:
        Returns path of the JSP page
        Throws:
        ViewConfigException

      • getFilePath

        public java.lang.String getFilePath(java.lang.String moduleName,
                                    java.lang.String moduleInstance,
                                    java.lang.String pageName,
                                    java.lang.String teaserName)
                             throws ViewConfigException
        Find file's path for given site, module and instance. File can be layout file (header, footer, etc. moduleName==null, moduleInstance==null), default teaser file (pageName == null && teaserName == null), secondary page (pageName != null, teaserName == null), non-default teaser file (pageName == null, teaserName != null)
        Parameters:
        moduleName - name of the module. If null - assume layout
        moduleInstance - name of the module's instance
        pageName - name of the page
        teaserName - name of the non-default teaser
        Returns:
        file's path
        Throws:
        ViewConfigException
